original_text: For the entrance to the inner sanctuary he made doors out of olive wood that were one fifth of the width of the sanctuary.
korean_text: 내소에 들어가는 곳에는 감람나무로 문을 만들었는데 그 문인방과 문설주는 벽의 오분의 일이요

sentences.original_text: For the entrance to the inner sanctuary
he made doors out of olive wood
that were one fifth of the width
